Text.Page:
My Dear Father,

I am pleased to tell you that I have finally located materials for my latest weapon design.
I have been following rumors that fine ores had been found near the Temple of Dagon. Because this is widely known, a number of craftsmen are traveling to the temple for those materials, and so I must hurry to get there first.

I will write to you once I have secured the ore.
May the gods grant me swift travel!

- Karakhir

Hand the letter back to Seir.
